update customer
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
credentials_type = #{credentialsType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
credentials_num = #{credentialsNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
interest_id = #{interestId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wechat_open_id = #{wechatOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq_open_id = #{qqOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
microblog_open_id = #{microblogOpenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occupation_id = #{occupationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
front_portrait_url = #{frontPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
back_portrait_url = #{backPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_portrait_url = #{headPortraitUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cust_status = #{custStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cust_password = #{custPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sign_name = #{signName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
star_sign = #{starSign,jdbcType=CHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
voice_url = #{voiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
voice_time = #{voiceTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
v_voice_url = #{vVoiceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_voice_url_tmp = #{vVoiceUrlTmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
v_voice_time_tmp = #{vVoiceTimeTmp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
v_voice_status = #{voiceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
v_voice_time = #{vVoiceTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
v_status = #{vStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
identity_status = #{identityStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
token_code = #{tokenCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
other_relation = #{otherRelation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_channel_name = #{appChannelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
appearance = #{appearance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
appearance_status = #{appearanceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_portrait_status = #{headPortraitStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select customer_id, real_name, credentials_type, credentials_num, front_portrait_url, back_portrait_url,identity_status from customer where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select customer_id as customerId,sex, nick_name as nickname, type,credentials_num as credentialsNum, interest_id as interestId,occupation_id as occupationId, front_portrait_url as frontPortraitUrl, cust_status as custStatus,sign_name as signName,head_portrait_url as headPortraitUrl, star_sign as starSign, birthday, voice_url as voiceUrl, voice_time as voiceTime, v_voice_url as vVoiceUrl, v_voice_time as vVoiceTime,v_voice_status AS voiceStatus,v_status as vStatus, identity_status as identityStatus, token_code as tokenCode, other_relation as otherRelation
from customer where customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select COUNT(1) from customer where nick_name = #{nickName} and customer_id <> #{customerId}
